review.title: “Good company to work for Software Development in Singapore”
review.pros: Pros – Very friendly people to work with and good projects
review.cons: Cons – Salary lesser compared to other places

review.title: “A very good employer to work with, fun and caring management.”
review.pros: Pros – Management has high level of confidence towards its employees. No micro-management is practiced but employees are expected to escalate problems as soon as they happen without procrastination. Good exposure as the company's main portfolio is on e-government projects.
review.cons: Cons – Can be quite stressful when project delivery time.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Should diversify and expand to capture overseas opportunities/markets as Singapore markets are saturated.
